name: Roll the D.E.Y.E
description:
The D.E.Y.E (Dice-like Emulsified Young Entity) bumbles about its facility of birth and avoids it's ravenous sibling

Made in 72(24) hours for Minijam 83 - dread

Programming and Art by KassieKitsune- @LanFanHasA (Twitter)

Sound by Olivia Renee Soules - @Olipolygon(Twitter)- Bandcamp
